Name: Patient
Description: Basic user/patient role for booking appointments and accessing their healthcare journey

Name: Expert Community
Description: Standard expert tier with core expert features. Pays 20% commission (monthly) or 12% (annual)

Name: Expert Top
Description: Premium expert tier with advanced features. Pays 18% commission (monthly) or 8% (annual)

Name: Clinic Member
Description: Expert who is a member of a clinic organization (not admin). Can manage their own practice + view shared clinic resources

Name: Clinic Admin
Description: Administrator of a clinic organization. Can manage team, patients, schedule, and clinic settings

Name: Platform Admin
Description: Platform-level administrator with full system access. For Eleva Care team only
